Package com.github.wix_maven

Class Summary
AbstractInsigniaMojo Abstract Goal which executes WiX Insignia for
inscribing an MSI with the digital signatures that its external CABs are signed with.
AbstractLinker  
AbstractPackageable  
AbstractTorchMojo Abstract Goal which executes WiX torch to create diff files - mst, wixmst
AbstractWixMojo  
ArtifactItem ArtifactItem represents information specified in the plugin configuration section for each artifact.
AttachBundleEngineMojo Attach the (signed) bundle engine back to the bundle.
CandleMojo Goal which executes WiX candle to create a .wixobj file.
DetachBundleEngineMojo Detach the bundle engine from the bundle for signing.
InscribeMojo Using insignia tool to inscribe each msi with signature details of external cabs ie.
LightMojo Goal which executes WiX light to create a .msi file.
LitMojo Goal which executes WiX lit to create a .wixlib file.
PackageMojo Jars up the NAR files.
PatchMojo Goal which executes WiX torch & pyro to create msp files.
PreparePackageMojo Create meta about this build for dependency inclusion.
SmokeMojo Smoke to perform 'unit' testing of msi/msp Smoke runs ICE similar to light, this goal allows a seperate execution from the linker step.
ToolsetMojo Goal to initialize the workspace with wix toolset.
TransformMojo Goal which executes WiX torch to create diff files - mst, cab
UnpackDependenciesMojo Goal that unpacks the project dependencies from the repository to a defined location.
ValidateMojo Goal to validate the configuration
WixInfo
